properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 9 at 4:02AM EST until February 11 at 5:07AM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Virginia...North Carolina...

Roanoke (Staunton) River at Randolph affecting Charlotte and Halifax
Counties
Dan River near Danville affecting Caswell...Rockingham...City of
Danville and Pittsylvania Counties
Dan River at Paces affecting Halifax County
Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County

Moderate flooding continued on the Dan River from Paces to South Boston.
The Dan River has crested at Paces and was beginning to crest at South
Boston. Minor flooding continued on the Dan River at Danville, where the
river has crested and continued to fall.

Minor flooding continued on the Roanoke River at Randolph. The river had
crested and will continue to fall.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Dan River at South Boston.
* until late Monday night.
* at 03AM Sunday the stage was 30.4 feet.
* Flood stage is 22.0 feet.
* The river will continue rising to near 30.7 feet by 7AM.
The river will fall below flood stage Monday afternoon.
* Impact...at 29.5 feet...Route 501 floods and number of
businesses in the Riverdale area are affected.
* Flood history...this crest compares to a previous crest of 31.4
feet on Oct 13 2018.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive through flooded areas...the water may be much deeper
than you think.

Graphical forecast information is available on the internet at
http://www.weather.gov/rnk (lower case). Click on 'rivers & lakes'.

The next scheduled statement will be issued around noon.
